Package il.ac.hit.View

Class TableHomeFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.hit.View.TableHomeFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimpleActions, IViewSimpleActions
    public class TableHomeFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements IViewSimpleActions
    This class holds the components of the main screen hence providing the interaction between the user and the application.

    • Method Detail

      • updateGradesTable

        public void updateGradesTable​(java.util.List<CourseDetails> courseDetails)
        Updates the table with an ArrayList of CourseDetails Objects. Each CourseDetails object is then displayed to the user inside the table.
        Specified by:
        updateGradesTable in interface IViewSimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseDetails - The CourseDetails Class object holds all the components that assemble the grade.

      • addGrade

        public void addGrade​(CourseDetails courseDetails)
              throws DBActionsException
        This method is triggered once the "Add Grade" button is pressed by the user. It adds a CourseDetails object to the table. The grade components are then displayed to the user inside the table.
        Specified by:
        addGrade in interface ISimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseDetails - The CourseDetails Class object holds all the components that assemble the grade.
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - triggered if there's and SQL exception

      • deleteGrade

        public void deleteGrade​(java.lang.String courseName)
                 throws DBActionsException
        This method is triggered once the "Delete Grade" button is pressed by the user. It deletes the CourseDetails object from the table and the grade components are then removed from the table.
        Specified by:
        deleteGrade in interface ISimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseName - the string that holds the name of the course
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - triggered if there's and SQL exception

      • editGrade

        public void editGrade​(CourseDetails courseDetails)
               throws DBActionsException
        This method is triggered once the user is trying to add the same course to the table, a message will be displayed to the screen asking the user if he confirms the change of the same grade.
        Specified by:
        editGrade in interface ISimpleActions
        Parameters:
        courseDetails - the objects that holds all the course details
        Throws:
        DBActionsException - triggered if there's and SQL exception

      • updateGPA

        public void updateGPA​(java.lang.Double calculate_gpa)
        Sets the current GPA to be in a format of "##.##" i.e: "93.45". This method is triggered once a new grade is added.
        Specified by:
        updateGPA in interface IViewSimpleActions
        Parameters:
        calculate_gpa - The outcome from the calculation of the GPA that is then formatted to "##.##" format.

      • updateCourseComboBox

        public void updateCourseComboBox​(java.util.List<CourseDetails> gradeTable)
        This method updates the "CourseComboBox" with the list of all the course names.
        Parameters:
        gradeTable - a list that holds all the CourseDetails objects
